org.jay3d.engine.core

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jay3d.engine.core.GameObject

  • public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    GameObject class uses multiple classes including Transform, Shader, GameComponent. It is then added to a game class that is linked to both a Rendering Engine and Core Engine to render the objects and make sure everything is placed in a proper parent-child hierarchy.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameObject()
      Constructs and initialises a GameObject with a list of children, components and a transform.

    • Method Detail

      • addChild

        public void addChild(GameObject child)
        Parameters:
        child - Child GameObject to add to this current GameObject.

      • addComponent

        public GameObject addComponent(GameComponent component)
        Parameters:
        component - The type of component to add to this particular GameObject.

        For example, you could add a LookAtComponent to the GameObject to follow a particular points using nlerp or slerp.

        Returns:
        Current GameObject with new Child object added to it's children list.

      • inputAll

        public void inputAll(float delta)

      • getAllAttached

        public java.util.ArrayList<GameObject> getAllAttached()
        Used in order to get the ArrayList of child objects attached to this GameObject. This will only return a list of it's children and not parents.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of child objects.

      • updateAll

        public void updateAll(float delta)

        public void render(Shader shader,
                   RenderingEngine renderingEngine)

      • setEngine

        public void setEngine(CoreEngine engine)
        If you wish to use a specific CoreEngine for this specific GameObject you may do so. The method automatically adds all child components and objects to the same Engine that it's parent is now set to.
        Parameters:
        engine -

        public Transform getTransform()
